alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:56PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CAMERON AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 100 AM CST... At 1156 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Grand Chenier, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gueydan, Wright, and Florence Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
